tasks.title: Calculate Base Hit for momentum
tasks.description: Analyze losing trades for momentum to find average Maximum Favorable Excursion (MFE). Set cash exit at loss MFE average. Calculate expected savings from converting losses to small wins. Save base_hit_config.json to output/strategies/momentum/.

tasks.title: Calculate Base Hit for momentum
tasks.description: Analyze losing trades for momentum to find average Maximum Favorable Excursion (MFE). Set cash exit at loss MFE average. Calculate expected savings from converting losses to small wins. Save base_hit_config.json to output/strategies/momentum/.

tasks.title: Run grid search for momentum params
tasks.description: Optimize momentum parameters using coarse grid search (e.g., [7,10,14,21,28] not [10,11,12...]). Test ±20% perturbation - reject knife-edge optima. Ensure range ratio <30%. Save optimization results with robustness analysis to output/strategies/optimizations/.
